review: Dr.Tanuja is a very friendly doctor .Tanuja mam has given safe c section delivery to our boy child. she take care her patients .she explained each and every solution.I suggested by my gynecologist Dr Tanuja mam. she take care a lot.Doctor and nurse service  is too good. I recommend to safe delivery best gynacologyst Dr.tanuja mam Thank you.
She explained the solution in proper manner and exact tests were recommended. Thus resolving the gyanic issue

The Journey with Dr Tanuja 

Dr. Tanuja, my gynecologist, embodied a unique talent for effective communication that transcended mere medical expertise. With a calm and reassuring demeanor, she effortlessly translated complex medical jargon into easily understandable language, ensuring I comprehended every aspect of my health concerns. Her ability to listen attentively and answer my questions in a comprehensive yet empathetic manner made each visit a comforting experience.

One thing I truly appreciated about Dr. Tanuja was her unwavering commitment to patient care. She never rushed through appointments, taking the time to address all my concerns, instilling a sense of confidence and trust in her expertise. Her genuine concern for my well-being extended beyond the examination room, as she consistently followed up on treatments and test results, showcasing her dedication to providing holistic care.
The depth of Dr. Tanuja's knowledge and her ability to convey information were exemplary. While Dr Tanuja communication skills and dedication to patient care were commendable. 

All I would finally say is that Dr Tanuja remains an exceptional gynecologist whose empathetic communication style and commitment to patient welfare shine brightly. I wish her all the very best and all the success to come.

Thanks and regards,
Sydney Hall, Victoria Wilson parents of Shrewyn Hall

review: Dr. Tanuja is a very great and friendly doctor she takes care of her patients very well I was suggested by my gynecologist to meet Dr tanuja in last moment of my daughter's delivery has our previous gynecologist was going out of station so we came and met her she took our case and we are advised to admitt in the hospital because my daughter is having high BP values next day evening suddenly at 7pm she got emergency because of her water break Dr. Tanuja was in time and handled the situation very well  though my daughter's BP was 200/100 at the time of surgery she saved my daughter and grandson we will be really thankful  to her üôè

We have consulted doctor Tanuja for pregnancy and in the duration of repeated consultations, we observed that she is so precise and she pin points on what actually needs to be considered during the time of medication, she just gives her best for the well-being of mother and child, just trust her and go with the flow, during the time of delivery, entire team of doctor Tanuja has contributed to their best, I thank from the bottom of my heart to each and every one who was there and provided positive vibes to the patient at the time of delivery

Dr. Tanuja Madam was very young and talented and intelligent, I was very satisfied her treatment she has very much of patience and excellent explanation and politely behaviour. I blessed with a Baby Boy. Thanku so much üíì thanks a lot üôè üíì üíó  Tanuja madam. After delivery also good responsible behaviour whenever I have doubts and need medication.

She treats the pregnant women  with friendly manner and give moral and metal  support  and treat them with good medication. And fallup thire  health .I 
am  the  person  who didn't conceive form last few years she treated me I got conceive with in few months. All the Credits go's to madam Dr P. Thanuja

I myself is a neonatolgist...dr thanuja mam is very very patient friendly.I strongly recommend her...without her my labour wouldnot be so easy...techincally my labour wasnt easy as i tried NVD without epidural and baby was in ROT and liquor was moderate...still with moral support of mam i was able to have a safe delivery and healthy baby...choose your obstetrician meticulously before starting your beautiful journey of pregnancy and motherhood...I did mine...how abt urs?!!

Dr.Tanuja mam is very friendly, responsive, and always answers your queries . Her willingness to reply to questions through WhatsApp or calls and the ability to explain things clearly with patience are certainly positive attributes that can contribute to a positive doctor-patient relationship.Overall I personally had a very good experience with her.
Am happy with friendly nature of doctor and explain detailed  each and every thing. She mainly first preference for normal delivery.am also recommended my friend here.

tags: Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: Very nice and to the point. Gives good opinion and solutions to problems. My wife forst pregnancy and she was very nervous but doctor took care of evry aspect. She was always there when needed even on whats app.

She would rather discuss crucial information with my father who doesn't know anything about female anatomy than the patient who actually pointed out that the pain was different than the regular cramps i faced. *** **** ******* *** ** ***** **** ** *** ***** **** *** ***** A single tear and she will consider you (even if an adult) to be toddler that must be kept outside the room while sharing information about the patient.  **** ** *** *** * ***** ********** ****** ******* *** ******* *** ***** **** **** * ********* When the problem is about a female patient it should be explained to the female patient not her male gaurdian regardless of her age. Anticipation and second hand information will not make things better for the patient.
reply_text: I'm extremely sorry that u have felt this.I thought I shouldn't scare a 19yr old girl that we are anticipating cancerous cyst ...so before we break the news to the so called adult patient I wanted to discuss with the father ...so I made the patient wait outside...wrote  investigations to confirm wether it is infectious or cancerous in origin...and before I speak any word I wanted to do the confirmatory tests ...hence didn't reveal the situation to the girl....and also if it turns out to be infectious origin then, the patient would have felt unnecessary anxiety and tension. It was my mistake that I didn't want to give that tension to a girl who is about to write her MBA exams ...and it has got nothing to do with female anatomy .This is how we break  news   to anyone if we r suspecting cancer...first we speak to the attendants and then to the patient irrespective of their age...and worse conduct...?I was all filled with sympathy that a 19 yr old girl has to go through this but this is wat u make out of my concern. Thank u.

review:
Very friendly and good doctor  suggests  & treats on emergency basis also and medication or response from the doctor is very nice  also 

Happy with the treatment from Tanuja Garu.
Thanuja mam is an excellent doctor and her treatment was always amazing .she is an extraordinary intelligent doctor with good smiling face.....I have a nice experience with mam...

She is very polite, explained clearly..In my delivery she tried a lot for veginal delivery but emergency c section done.now also I contact her through phone call for any doubts, she responds every cals or msg..I recommend  one of my friend also now...

From Pre pregnancy to pregnancy and during the pregnancy days,
Dr. Tanuja was really helpful, friendly, knowledgeable and lead us through the correct, safe and meaningful path for the treatment.
She was readily available to me on WhatsApp for any information and help. She has been very kind and supportive during my treatment.

*** ** *** **** ************ * *** ********* ** ****** 
She is very polite and humble person,her way of treating patients was really unique .
she gave me strength when I got aborted through her words,all the time patients doesn't need only medication instead doctor's caring about patients strength to deal their situation is very important.
